name: Xpedition
overview: Xpedition is a side-scrolling science fiction action shooter. The game allows you to assemble a team of four members, including marines and mechs, assign equipment and select one of a few available extended missions. The player can control only one team member at a time. Aside of killing every hostile creature the game requires you to complete small side quests, such as repairing a broken mechanism or capture an alien.
